title: Column icons don't appear when connecting to a Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons do not appear in the Available Items section of the Data Source.
OB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items section, the table icons are visible, but the column icons are missing.
EB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items section, both the table icons and the column icons should be visible.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new project
2. Create a new report
3. In the Data Explorer view, add a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database using the following settings:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query.
